website_summaries.verdict: A long-lasting battery and replaceable parts put these battle drones a cut above other sets.
pros: Trouble-free startups thanks to easy-to-set altitude and headless mode
Responsive controls allow for flips and quick turns
cons: Charging the battery takes longer than other models, up to 90 minutes

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly fun, and highly capable. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: A pretty amazing way to get into flying drones with practically no risk. These are surprisingly hardy, responsive, and incredibly fast on the speed setting. Two shortcomings: 1) After every battery charge, you need to recalibrate the flying so it stays in place rather than drifts. Somehow, there should be a way to hold that in memory. 2) the battery tends to slip out while flying which gets the drone off balance. Overall however, these are incredibly fun, and highly capable.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Z

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for two or one!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these little drones are amazing! Fast and extremely agile, they even do flips in midair. My son and 10-year-old grandson love them, using the fighting mode to challenge each other and add to the enjoyment. Each transmitter is similar to a video-game controller, so you can figure things out quickly. There is even a safe-landing button to use while learning. Battery life is certainly adequate, but I would get extra batteries or charging sticks if away from home. The price is quite reasonable considering you get two complete drones plus USB chargers plus spare propellers. Holy Stone (Holyton) has come up with a product that is fun and well thought out.
customer_reviews.author: Judith A. Kuehn

customer_reviews.title: Fun and challenging
customer_reviews.text: These little guys are a blast to play with. I recommend starting in an open area with few obstacles. The mini drones do take practice to get used to and while they are durable enough to survive crashes its probably not wise to test fate. The only concern I have, thus a 4 star review, is they the props pop off in crashes and they can be hard to find as they are black and don't stand out. You get extra props in the box, but with kids and teenagers this is a concern. Marking them with bright tape or paint would be a good idea.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory T. Nagler

customer_reviews.title: Very fun and safe to fly indoors.
customer_reviews.text: These little drones are super fun to fly indoors. They’re extremely lightweight and the built-in propeller guards help them bump off walls and other obstacles without damaging them. They are, however, so small and light as to be kinda fragile so they need to be flown with care. They’re super fun, though, and very stable.

customer_reviews.title: These drones are super fast and fun!
customer_reviews.text: This company is amazing to work with. We had difficulty with one of our drones, and a representative from Holyton contacted me and quickly replaced our drone. We love these little drones. They are super fast flying machines. We recommend getting used to flying your drone inside before taking it outside for a field test.

customer_reviews.title: Great Battle Drones
customer_reviews.text: Drones are extremely responsive. Especially with the flips and quicker moves to avoid being shot by the other drone. Controls work well, standard layout. Great design, battery lasts longer than previous drones I've bought, this is the 3rd drone I've bought with the quality and price increasing. Had a big collision between drones with one arm getting loose. Maybe some replacement parts would be the only thing missing. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rager

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fly
customer_reviews.text: Drone is easy to fly for beginners and fun for accomplished as well. My 8 year old grandson loves the battle feature and just flying them. Customer sevice is good, I had one drone fail after a couple of days. Within 24 hours they had a replacement drone being shipped to me.
customer_reviews.author: B & R Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Fun little drones!
customer_reviews.text: These little drones are a blast. The altitude hold makes them easy for beginners, but their different speed modes and high power make them fun for the more experienced drone pilot as well. These little guys are fast in their top speed mode but very controllable in low speed mode
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Henry

customer_reviews.title: Nice drones
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little drones. Flight is better than expected. The flip feature is nifty. The combat feature has not been fully utilized as my flying is still a work in progress. Battery life is better than expected, but still low - so for an extended flying session you will want extra battery packs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: where you can battle with your friends and have fun.
customer_reviews.text: This product has two high-quality drones with different color shields, allows the players to switch team or color any time they want. This is a small drone, but very light, stabilize, and speedy. The drones also have a battle mode, where you can battle with your friends and have fun.
customer_reviews.author: Ailin Weng

customer_reviews.title: Solid flying and snappy controls
customer_reviews.text: This is my third drone and second from Holy Stone. Overall, I like the drones! The construction is solid and I like the protectors for the blades. I fly in the house so it comes in handy. These are also by far the easiest to control. The altitude control is on point and drifting is minimal. The drone is quiet too!! I'm not too happy with the controller. It's small, the buttons aren't intuitive, and switching modes is clunky. However, if you just want to get up in the air it'll do fine. Want to zip around like a humming bird with a friend? These drones are for you!
customer_reviews.author: K123

customer_reviews.title: Drones a happy gift
customer_reviews.text: This was amazing our grandson lives four states away. I thought I would send him a gift. Found the drones with one day free delivery. By golly, he had them flying the next afternoon. His mother said he LOVES them and I am so grateful. A gift that didn't cost an arm and a leg, made my 14 year old grandson, his parents, and us smile with joy for days

product_meta.title: Holyton Mini RC Battle Drones with Infrared Fighting Function, Altitude Hold Mode, Headless Mode and 3D Flips, RTF Quadcopter Easy Fly for Kids and Beginners, Color Blue and Red, Pack of 2
product_meta.description:
Features:


 * 1.Battle Drone with Infrared: The most Special Feature is Support Flight Battle Drone can transmit infra- red (IR) light
 * 2. Smart Mini Drones: This mini quadcopter size 125x125x40mm(4.9x4.9x1.4inches)Pretty small, about the size of adult hand
 * 3.Three Speed Modes: Drone comes with beginner, intermediate, and advanced three speed modes can quickly adjust mode in mid-flight
 * 4.Altitude Hold Function: Built with altitude hold function providing stable flight, the drone can automatically hover at a certain height
 * 5.Headless Mode: Allow the drone always fly in the direction the stick points, don't worry about the drone's direction when it flies far away
 * 6.Left/Right Hand Control Modes: Hold the upper left button on the remote while pressing the power button to change to mode 2
 * 7.Colorful Detachable Drone Shell: There are 4 Colors of fuselages for you to choose you can customize your drone with different color
 * 8.One Key Engine Start/Landing: Press button to make the drone's engine start or land steadily after the drone is paired with its controller
 * 9. More safer to flying: Drone with Emergency Stop function and Low Power Alert the LED light on the drone will keep blink when battery is in low



Specifications:


 * Remote control: 2.4GHz 4 Channel
 * Charging time: 45-60 minutes
 * Flying Time: About 7-9 Minutes
 * Remote control distance: about 30-50 meters
 * Drone size: 12.5*12.5*3.5CM (4.9x 4.9x 1.4 inches)
 * Product Weight: 31.7g(0.07 pounds)



What are included


 * 2 x HS177 Quad Copter(Red and Blue)
 * 2 x 2.4GHz Remote Transmitters
 * 1 x HS177 Fuselage (Green)
 * 2 x 3.7 V 250mAh LiPo Battery
 * 8 x Rotating Blade
 * 2 x USB Charger
 * 1 x Blades Changer
 * 1 x Screwdriver
 * 1 x User Manual
feature_bullets: ⭐BATTLE DRONES MORE FUN TO FLY : Package comes with two Quad Copter and two 2.4GHz Remote Transmitters for battle. You can shoot down the rivals by the Infrared. If the drone is hit by the infrared 4 times, it will be defeated and land slowly. Enjoy more fun from the drones with your kids and friends!

⭐STABLE AND HIGH SENSITIVE FLIGHT : Altitude hold function will hover steadily at a setting height, which makes it easy to control. Drone built in gyro sensitive responsive controls, allows you to make really sharp banking turns.

⭐THREE SPEED MODES AND 3D FLIPS : A button to quickly adjust three modes beginner, intermediate, advanced. Pressing the flip button and turn a direction the drone will do 360 degrees flip in that direction.

⭐HEADLESS MODE AND ONE KEY START/LANDING : Headless mode allows the drone fly in the direction the stick points, don't worry about which way the drone is facing . Pressing One key easy start and landing button, it will start or land steadily after the drone is paired with its controller.

⭐COLORFUL SHELLS AND MORE FEATURES : 4 Colors of fuselages for you to choose, search “B07C22Y9SW” for other fuselages (red blue green yellow), the fuselage can be exchange easily. More function : Left/Right Hand Control Modes,Emergency Stop and so on. About 7-12 Minutes Flying Time; Charging Time: About 40-90 minutes; Operation Range: About 30-50 meters.
